text: Bishop Derek Byrne S.P.S. (born 17 January 1948) is an Irish priest of the St. Patrick's Missionary Society (Kiltegan Fathers), who is Bishop of Primavera do Leste–Paranatinga, Brazil (25 June 2014 – present); previously Byrne served as Bishop of Guiratinga, Brazil (2008–2014)Kiltegan Priest appointed Bishop in Brazil www.kandle.ie Born Derek John Christopher Byrne, is from Monkstown, County Dublin. He attended Newbridge College. He studied at University College Cork earning a BA in Philosophy and Theological Studies in St. Patrick's College, Kiltegan, where he was ordained a priest in 1973.Bishop Derek Byrne SPS International Eucharistic Congress 2012. Fr Byrne following ordination went to Brazil where he served until 1980. He worked in Ireland and America before going back to Brazil in 2003. ==See also== *Catholic Church in Brazil ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Irish Roman Catholic priests Category:Clergy from Dublin (city) Category:Alumni of University College Cork Category:People educated at Newbridge College Category:Living people Category:Roman Catholic bishops in Brazil Category:Irish expatriate Catholic bishops Category:People from Monkstown, County Dublin
